Articles.Content: Are there any mods that transfer any of the existing planets into "livable" planets with "breathable" atmospheres for our dear Kerbals? Being able to end game colonize Duna, Eve, or Laythe would be awesome. More than just placing air-tite bases, I'm talking actual colonization!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131370-WIP-Kerbal-Terrain-System

Might not give you colonies, and its pretty new, but its the best terraforming mod I could find.
AFAIK making a proper terraforming mod is impossible at least at the moment, sorry.
